fr.n7.stl.block.ast

Interface TypeFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockFactoryImpl

    public interface TypeFactory
    Factory to create nodes for types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Type createArrayType(Type _element)
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for an array type.
      Type createBooleanType()
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for the boolean type.
      Type createCharType()
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for the char type.
      Type createCoupleType(Type _first, Type _second)
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a couple type.
      FieldDeclaration createFieldDeclaration(java.lang.String _name, Type _type)
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a field declaration in a record type.
      Type createFloatingType()
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for the float type.
      Type createFunctionType(Type _result, java.lang.Iterable<Type> _parameters)
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a function type.
      Type createIntegerType()
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for the integer type.
      Type createNamedType(TypeDeclaration _declaration)
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a named type (e.g. in a type definition).
      Type createPointerType(Type _element)
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a pointer type.

      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for an empty (i.e. without fields) record type.
      RecordType createRecordType(java.lang.String _name, java.lang.Iterable<FieldDeclaration> _fields)
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for record type containing fields.
      Type createStringType()
      Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for the String type.

      • createCoupleType

        Type createCoupleType(Type _first,
                      Type _second)
        Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a couple type.
        Parameters:
        _first - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type of the first element of the couple.
        _second - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type of the second element of the couple.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for a couple type.

      • createArrayType

        Type createArrayType(Type _element)
        Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for an array type.
        Parameters:
        _element - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type of the elements in the array type.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for an array type.

      • createPointerType

        Type createPointerType(Type _element)
        Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a pointer type.
        Parameters:
        _element - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type of the target element in the pointer type.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for a pointer type.

      • createFunctionType

        Type createFunctionType(Type _result,
                        java.lang.Iterable<Type> _parameters)
        Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a function type.
        Parameters:
        _result - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type of the result in the function type.
        _parameters - Abstract Syntax Trees for the types of the sequence of parameters in the function type.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for a function type.

      • createNamedType

        Type createNamedType(TypeDeclaration _declaration)
        Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a named type (e.g. in a type definition).
        Parameters:
        _declaration - Abstract Syntax Tree for the target type in the named type.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for a named type.

      • createRecordType

        RecordType createRecordType(java.lang.String _name)
        Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for an empty (i.e. without fields) record type. The fields can be added later on.
        Parameters:
        _name - Name of the record type.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for a record type.

      • createRecordType

        RecordType createRecordType(java.lang.String _name,
                            java.lang.Iterable<FieldDeclaration> _fields)
        Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for record type containing fields.
        Parameters:
        _name - Name of the record type.
        _fields - Abstract Syntax Tree nodes for the fields in the record type.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for a record type.

      • createFieldDeclaration

        FieldDeclaration createFieldDeclaration(java.lang.String _name,
                                        Type _type)
        Create an Abstract Syntax Tree node for a field declaration in a record type.
        Parameters:
        _name - Name of the record field.
        _type - Type of the record field.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for a field declaration in a record type.
